com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context.impl

Class XmlAspect.Advice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context.impl.XmlAspect.Advice
  • Enclosing class:
    XmlAspect

    public static class XmlAspect.Advice
extends java.lang.Object

    Encapsulates an "advice" contained within an aspect.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 07/18/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()
        Returns the Advice ID. This is the name of the advice method in the aspect class.

        ID

        Parameters:
        type - Advice type to set

      • getOrder

        public int getOrder()
        Returns the Advice precedence. A smaller number indicates a higher precedence, while a larger number indicates a lower precedence. The default value is Integer.MAX_VALUE. The precedence determines the order in which advice is executed.
        Returns:
        Advice precedence

      • setOrder

        public void setOrder(int order)
        Sets the Advice precedence. A smaller number indicates a higher precedence, while a larger number indicates a lower precedence. The default value is Integer.MAX_VALUE. The precedence determines the order in which advice is executed.
        Parameters:
        order - Advice precedence to set

      • getSeparatedValues

        public java.lang.String[] getSeparatedValues()
        Returns the separated pointcut values, which are delimited by ';'.
        Returns:
        pointcut values
